title: Virgin Galactic selects Arizona for spaceplane manufacturing facility
summary: Virgin Galactic announced July 14 plans to assemble a fleet of suborbital spaceplanes in a new factory in a suburb of Phoenix.

title: Rocket Report: Vega-C is a sight to see; will Europe push SpaceX aside?
summary: "I am delighted to see solid progress towards first flight."

title: A common ground system for military satellites is proving to be harder than envisioned
summary: Space Force satellite operators want to move away from having different ground systems for each military constellation

title: NASA division proposing program to send scientists to ISS
summary: A NASA science division is seeking funding for a program that could fly scientists to the International Space Station on private missions to conduct research that could then be handed off to NASA astronauts.

title: Georgia approves Starlink services in Eastern Europe
summary: Georgia became the latest country July 14 to approve SpaceX’s Starlink broadband constellation.
